attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not understand why a tyrant (Sadam Hussein) is removed from power and executed for all his inhuman acts against his own people - yet, we do nothing to stop the ongoing genoside in Zimbabwe!!!  Is this beacuse there is no oil or anything for our country to gain in doing so???

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=mugabe&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=memorial&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
